title: Oonoonba: Failed signature verification at fork transition
body:
**Describe the bug**

In oonoonba, `ALTAIR_FORK_EPOCH=10` and block signature verification failed at block 320:
```
Jun-03 10:33:56.005 [SYNC]          verbose: Batch process error id=Finalized, startEpoch=8, status=Processing code=BLOCK_ERROR_BEACON_CHAIN_ERROR, error={"code":"BLOCK_ERROR_INVALID_SIGNATURE"}
Error: BLOCK_ERROR_INVALID_SIGNATURE
    at processChainSegment (/Users/tuyennguyen/Projects/workshop/lodestar/packages/lodestar/src/chain/blocks/process.ts:144:17)
    at processChainSegmentJob (/Users/tuyennguyen/Projects/workshop/lodestar/packages/lodestar/src/chain/blocks/processor.ts:144:3)
    at Object.job (/Users/tuyennguyen/Projects/workshop/lodestar/packages/lodestar/src/chain/blocks/processor.ts:42:42)
    at JobQueue.runJob (/Users/tuyennguyen/Projects/workshop/lodestar/packages/lodestar/src/util/queue/index.ts:106:22)
Error: BLOCK_ERROR_BEACON_CHAIN_ERROR
    at processChainSegment (/Users/tuyennguyen/Projects/workshop/lodestar/packages/lodestar/src/chain/blocks/process.ts:181:13)
    at processChainSegmentJob (/Users/tuyennguyen/Projects/workshop/lodestar/packages/lodestar/src/chain/blocks/processor.ts:144:3)
    at Object.job (/Users/tuyennguyen/Projects/workshop/lodestar/packages/lodestar/src/chain/blocks/processor.ts:42:42)
    at JobQueue.runJob (/Users/tuyennguyen/Projects/workshop/lodestar/packages/lodestar/src/util/queue/index.ts:106:22)
Jun-03 10:33:56.013 [CHAIN]         verbose: Clock slot slot=7165
```

The reason is we use `getPreState()` for signature verification and it stays in `phase0` so it does not have correct fork version there. In the below log we can see that the state does not have the correct fork version for signature verification

```
@@@ getProposerSignatureSet of block 320, epochSig 10
@@@ getDomain messageEpoch=10, forkVersion Uint8Array(4) [ 0, 0, 72, 17 ]
@@@ getDomain messageEpoch=10, forkVersion Uint8Array(4) [ 0, 0, 72, 17 ]
@@@ getDomain messageEpoch=9, forkVersion Uint8Array(4) [ 0, 0, 72, 17 ]
```

We may want to use `getBlockSlotState` instead of `getPreState` for signature verification, at the real state transition we don't have to process slot again so it should not affect the performance.

**Expected behavior**

It should pass signature verification
